Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Houston in 2011...
Injured on 5/30/2011 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2012, off Justin Duchscherer (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/21/2012, off Brandon Beachy (FLA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2014, hitting .483 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2016...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Milwaukee on 4/29/2017...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/25/2017...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis on 4/4/2018...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Milwaukee on 4/24/2018...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles (A) on 6/1/2018...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 6/1/2018...
Traded from Houston to Seattle on 6/30/2018 (Going to HOU: LF R. Woolverton, P B. Hendrickson, P L. Warneke Jr., P S. Fuller. Going to SEA: 2B J. Altuve, P B. Cuevas)...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/27/2018, hitting .394 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2018, hitting .366 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 5/1/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/9/2020, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles (A) on 5/10/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/30/2020, hitting .538 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2020, hitting .442 with 8 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Detroit, driving in 5 runs on 4/23/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/26/2021, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2021, hitting .470 with 10 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/21/2021, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/31/2022, off Cliff Melton Jr. (NYM)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/16/2022...
